hero.title: Train. Book. Compete.

hero.title: Personal Overview Panel
hero.description: Browse tournaments and events, discover academies, book facilities, and explore our YouSport channel. Built for the investor demo — fully responsive UI with clear stubs where deeper integrations are required.

news.title: Latest News
news.description: Updates on programs, results, and features.

tournaments.title: Tournaments & Events

support.title: Support Center

yousport.title: Latest YouSport Clip
yousport.description: Watch public highlights from the community.

hero.title: Events & Contests
hero.description: Join exciting sports events, participate in contests, and vote for your favorites. Be part of the community and win amazing prizes!

sections.upcomingDescription: Discover and register for upcoming sports events and competitions.
sections.contestsDescription: Participate in interactive contests and showcase your skills.
sections.votingDescription: Vote for your favorite athletes, moments, and content. Your voice matters!

voting.alreadyVoted: You have already voted for this item
voting.votingClosed: Voting is closed for this contest

hero.title: Sports Academies
hero.description: Join elite sports academies with professional coaching, world-class facilities, and comprehensive training programs. Choose your package and start your journey to excellence.

sections.directoryDescription: Explore our network of professional sports academies and find the perfect training environment for your goals.
sections.packageDescription: Choose the training package that best fits your needs and budget. All packages include access to our facilities and expert coaching.

bronze.title: Bronze Package
bronze.description: Perfect for beginners and recreational athletes

silver.title: Silver Package
silver.description: Ideal for serious athletes and competitors
